name: Python
description: Python is a versatile and easy-to-learn programming language. It is widely used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and more.

name: Python
description: Take your Python skills to the next level! This intermediate course covers advanced topics like web frameworks, asynchronous programming, and data manipulation.

name: Python
description: Master Python with this advanced course! Explore topics such as machine learning, data science, and building scalable applications.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript powers the dynamic behavior of web pages. Learn the basics and start creating interactive websites.

description: Dive deeper into JavaScript! Explore concepts like DOM manipulation, AJAX, and ES6 features in this intermediate course.

name: Java
description: Java is a robust and versatile programming language. Learn the fundamentals and start building applications.
